content: Fix missing gems issue in DigitalOcean deployment

Test deployment with runtime credentials configuration

Clean up old containers and attempt fresh deployment
Write comprehensive wrap-up for development journal documenting DigitalOcean deployment challenges
Destroy DigitalOcean instance to stop incurring costs
